sentences.en: An introduction to environmental level of transuranium elements and a review of the recent advance in radiochemical analyses of them are made.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了超铀元素的环境水平，对它们的放射化学分析的进展进行了述评。

sentences.en: Direct counting guarantees the quantitive accuracy you need for important experiments and radiochemical purity measurements.
sentences.cn: 直接计数保证了重要的实验和放射化学纯度测量需要的定量精度。

sentences.en: Engaged in nuclear testing in 1966, the radiochemical diagnostic technical work.
sentences.cn: 1966年起从事核试验的放射化学诊断技术工作.

sentences.en: NGA was labeled directly with Na 99 mTcO 4. The radiochemical purity of 99 mTc - NGA was over 90 %.
sentences.cn: 用直接法制备99mTc - NGA, 其放化纯大于90%,且室温下可稳定6h以上,符合显像要求.

sentences.en: Progress in radiochemical analyses in 40 years since CIRP's founding is described in this paper.
sentences.cn: 介绍了中国辐射防护研究院建院40年来放射化学分析工作的进展.

sentences.en: Some new work on the Cherenkov counting technique and rapid radiochemical analysis has been published.
sentences.cn: 契连可夫计数技术以及快速放化分析方面也有新的工作发表.

trans.tran_cn: 已含放射性同位素的化学物质
